meanings.definition: A female server in a restaurant or cafe.
meanings.sent1: The waitresses at the diner were friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The waitresses brought out plates of delicious food to the customers.
meanings.sent3: The waitresses joked with each other as they balanced trays of food.
meanings.sent4: The waitresses were like graceful dancers, moving between tables with ease.
meanings.sent5: The waitresses' smiles brightened up the whole restaurant.

meanings.sent1: We need more waitresses to help serve all the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: The waitresses in the cafe wore matching uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The waitresses formed a line to greet the arriving guests.
meanings.sent4: The group of waitresses moved in perfect synchronization.
meanings.sent5: The waitresses' teamwork made the service run smoothly.
